problem_text: Find U B if \triangle R S T \sim \triangle U V W, T A and W B are medians, T A = 8, R A = 3, W B = 3 x - 6, and U B = x + 2.
compact_text: Find UB if \triangle RST \sim \triangle UVW, TA and WB are medians, TA = 8, RA = 3, WB = 3x-6, and UB = x+2.
annotat_text: Find $U B$ if $\triangle R S T \sim \triangle U V W, \overline{T A}$ and $\overline{WB}$ are medians, $T A=8$, $R A=3, W B=3 x-6,$ and $U B=x+2$
